footerDisplay:
Created by @roeio, updated by @Knilo. 

All config details can be obtained using `node palGateCli.js config` command.

deviceId.title: Gate ID
deviceId.description: The unique ID of the gate you wish to control.

token.title: Session Token
token.description: The session token generated during device linking.

tokenType.title: Token Type
tokenType.description: Set to 0 for SMS, 1 for Primary linking, or 2 for Secondary linking.

accessoryType.title: Accessory Type
accessoryType.description: How the gate is represented in HomeKit. Default is 'garageDoor'.

name.title: Gate Name
name.description: A friendly name for your gate. Default is 'Parking Gate'.
